title: VIPER: Process-aware Evaluation for Generative Video Reasoning
summary: Recent breakthroughs in video generation have demonstrated an emerging capability termed Chain-of-Frames (CoF) reasoning, where models resolve complex tasks through the generation of continuous frames.
